snippet: With its strong and verifiable limits, the accord offers the best chance to rein in Iran and potentially reshape Middle East politics.
abstract: Editorial hails final nuclear agreement with Iran as landmark piece of diplomacy that puts verifiable limit on Iran's ability to develop nuclear weapon and has potential to reshape Middle East politics; criticizes Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu and Republicans for rejecting deal that is beneficial to United States, Israel and international community; warns agreement does not guarantee implementation and says it would be irresponsible to squander valuable opportunity.
lead_paragraph: With its strong and verifiable limits, the accord offers the best chance to rein in Iran and potentially reshape Middle East politics.

headline.print_headline: The Best Chance to Rein In Iran
headline.main: An Iran Nuclear Deal That Reduces the Chance of War

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
